author: mtosi
body:
#### PR description:
as described in the JIRA [PDMVRELVALS-86](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/PDMVRELVALS-86)
the TRK POG would need to have the QCD_Pt_1800_2400 in the list of relval samples for the validation campaigns,
in particular for checking the tracking in the phase space of the dense environment typical of the high pT jets

this PR adds the genFragments (both for 13 and 14 TeV) and the element in the relval matrix
title: Rel val add qcd pt 1800 2400
